description: This file defines API endpoints related to test run history management, including listing, retrieving details, and fetching logs for test runs through a FastAPI router. It includes data models, route handlers with database interaction, and external service calls for log file URLs.

classes.name: RunHistoryResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model representing a run history record with details and URL information.

classes.name: PaginationResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for paginated list response of run histories.

classes.name: LogResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for log URL response.

methods.name: list_run_history( case_id: Optional[str] = Query(None), status: Optional[str] = Query(None), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100), current_user: User = Depends(require_permission(Permission.VIEW_HISTORY)), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list run histories with optional filtering and pagination.

methods.name: get_run_history( run_id: str, current_user: User = Depends(require_permission(Permission.VIEW_HISTORY)), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific run history by ID.

methods.name: get_execution_logs( run_id: str, current_user: User = Depends(require_permission(Permission.VIEW_HISTORY)), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Provides access to execution logs for a specific run, returning a URL for download or viewing.

ctags.name: get_execution_logs
ctags.signature: ( run_id: str, current_user: User = Depends(require_permission(Permission.VIEW_HISTORY)), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: get_run_history
ctags.signature: ( run_id: str, current_user: User = Depends(require_permission(Permission.VIEW_HISTORY)), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: list_run_history
ctags.signature: ( case_id: Optional[str] = Query(None), status: Optional[str] = Query(None), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100), current_user: User = Depends(require_permission(Permission.VIEW_HISTORY)), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
